name: Half-Elf
description: Walking in two worlds but truly belonging to neither, half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf and human parents.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

choiceOptions.label: Choose two other ability scores to increase by 1

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
